svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - July 29 2023

title: "Week in Ethereum News
July 29, 2023" date: "2023-07-28"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade
• Latest all core devs – consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim : Dencun upgrade
discussions: MEV-Boost testing needed, decided against adding parent beacon block root to execution
payload and when to rollout the fork choice change for confirmation rule EIPs can be presented in ACDC
calls prior to scoping Electra upgrade Discussed EIP6914 (reuse withdrawn validator indices) updates
and prototype of EIP6110 (validator deposits onchain) Increasing CL client spec compliance
Latest all core devs – consensus (ACDC) call video . Notes from Christine Kim :
• Dencun upgrade discussions: MEV-Boost testing needed, decided against adding parent beacon block
root to execution payload and when to rollout the fork choice change for confirmation rule
Dencun upgrade discussions: MEV-Boost testing needed, decided against adding parent beacon block root
to execution payload and when to rollout the fork choice change for confirmation rule
• EIPs can be presented in ACDC calls prior to scoping Electra upgrade
EIPs can be presented in ACDC calls prior to scoping Electra upgrade
• Discussed EIP6914 (reuse withdrawn validator indices) updates and prototype of EIP6110 (validator
deposits onchain)
Discussed EIP6914 (reuse withdrawn validator indices) updates and prototype of EIP6110 (validator
• Increasing CL client spec compliance
Increasing CL client spec compliance
• EIP4844: Latest EIP4844 implementer call. Notes from Terence : devnet 8 features, blob transaction
pool design and no incentives for MEV-Boost builders to include blobs KZG Ceremony extended until
August 23
• Latest EIP4844 implementer call. Notes from Terence : devnet 8 features, blob transaction pool
design and no incentives for MEV-Boost builders to include blobs
Latest EIP4844 implementer call. Notes from Terence : devnet 8 features, blob transaction pool design
and no incentives for MEV-Boost builders to include blobs
• KZG Ceremony extended until August 23
KZG Ceremony extended until August 23
Layer 1
• Nethermind implemented stateless verification , allows participation as a stateless client
Nethermind implemented stateless verification , allows participation as a stateless client
• Teku planned caching changes & memory reduction
Teku planned caching changes & memory reduction
• Lighthouse subnet backbone revamp & IPv6 support in recent v4.3.0 release
Lighthouse subnet backbone revamp & IPv6 support in recent v4.3.0 release
• Consensus layer mainnet bootnodes location & IP address
Consensus layer mainnet bootnodes location & IP address
• JIT EVM : convert EVM to machine code, using LLVM/inkwell, in Rust, proof of concept
JIT EVM : convert EVM to machine code, using LLVM/inkwell, in Rust, proof of concept
Research
• Game-theoretic model for MEV-Boost auctions : builder strategies to win auctions
Layer 2
• Public goods network (OP Stack rollup) live, aims to generate funding for public goods
Public goods network (OP Stack rollup) live, aims to generate funding for public goods
• Optimism law of chains proposed neutrality framework for Superchain (OP Stack) participants
Optimism law of chains proposed neutrality framework for Superchain (OP Stack) participants
EIPs/Standards
• EIPs: EIP7377 : Migration transaction (one-time transaction for EOA to deploy code to their address)
EIP7378 : Add time-weighted averaging to the base fee
EIPs:
• EIP7377 : Migration transaction (one-time transaction for EOA to deploy code to their address)
EIP7377 : Migration transaction (one-time transaction for EOA to deploy code to their address)
• EIP7378 : Add time-weighted averaging to the base fee
• ERCs (application layer): ERC7390 : Vanilla options ERC7399 : Flash loans ERC7401 : Parent-governed
NFT nesting ERC7405 : Portable contract accounts ERC7406 : Multi-namespace onchain registry ERC7409 :
Public NFT emote repository ERC7410 : ERC20 update allowance by spender ERC7412 : On-demand offchain
data retrieval ERC7417 : Token converter (convert between ERC20 & ERC223)
ERCs (application layer):
• ERC7390 : Vanilla options
ERC7390 : Vanilla options
• ERC7399 : Flash loans
ERC7399 : Flash loans
• ERC7401 : Parent-governed NFT nesting
ERC7401 : Parent-governed NFT nesting
• ERC7405 : Portable contract accounts
ERC7405 : Portable contract accounts
• ERC7406 : Multi-namespace onchain registry
ERC7406 : Multi-namespace onchain registry
• ERC7409 : Public NFT emote repository
ERC7409 : Public NFT emote repository
• ERC7410 : ERC20 update allowance by spender
ERC7410 : ERC20 update allowance by spender
• ERC7412 : On-demand offchain data retrieval
ERC7412 : On-demand offchain data retrieval
• ERC7417 : Token converter (convert between ERC20 & ERC223)
ERC7417 : Token converter (convert between ERC20 & ERC223)
This newsletter is made possible thanks to Rysk
Rysk Finance is an AMM for ETH options.
Rysk just launched on Arbitrum with:
• Constant onchain pricing mechanism
Constant onchain pricing mechanism
• Tight spreads via deep concentrated liquidity
Tight spreads via deep concentrated liquidity
Rysk's options AMM also offers uncorrelated returns for liquidity providers. While not risk-free, our
automated delta hedging mechanism aims to reduce risks in pursuit of superior risk-adjusted returns.
Trade options or provide liquidity for uncorrelated returns at Rysk Finance .
Stuff for developers
• OpenZeppelin Contracts Wizard adds Foundry project download
OpenZeppelin Contracts Wizard adds Foundry project download
• Deep dive into Solady ERC1967Factory for deploying & managing ERC1967 proxies
Deep dive into Solady ERC1967Factory for deploying & managing ERC1967 proxies
• EIP4626 contracts (tokenized vaults) don’t all emit Transfer event on mint, deposit, burn & redeem
EIP4626 contracts (tokenized vaults) don’t all emit Transfer event on mint, deposit, burn & redeem
• Halmos v0.1.0 (symbolic testing): improved performance and expanded EVM & cheatcode support
Halmos v0.1.0 (symbolic testing): improved performance and expanded EVM & cheatcode support
• WhatsABI v0.6.0 (guesses ABI from bytecode): autoload improvements & bug fixes
WhatsABI v0.6.0 (guesses ABI from bytecode): autoload improvements & bug fixes
• CTFs: Curta CTF sacred geometry solution Flashbots CTF August 5-7
CTFs:
• Curta CTF sacred geometry solution
Curta CTF sacred geometry solution
• Flashbots CTF August 5-7
Flashbots CTF August 5-7
Security
• EraLend on zkSync Era $3.4 million exploit via read-only re-entrancy
EraLend on zkSync Era $3.4 million exploit via read-only re-entrancy
• Conic Finance post mortem for ETH omnipool (read-only reentrancy) & crvUSD omnipool (sandwich)
exploits
Conic Finance post mortem for ETH omnipool (read-only reentrancy) & crvUSD omnipool (sandwich)
Ecosystem
• ETHGlobal Paris hackathon finalists
ETHGlobal Paris hackathon finalists
• Etherscan input data messages , view all transactions with detected messages
Etherscan input data messages , view all transactions with detected messages
Notable at app layer
• Rysk Finance (options AMM with uncorrelated returns for LPs) live on Arbitrum [Disclosure: Starbloom
portfolio]
Rysk Finance (options AMM with uncorrelated returns for LPs) live on Arbitrum [Disclosure: Starbloom
• Worldcoin (UBI via iris scan) live on Optimism Vitalik on biometric proof of personhood
Worldcoin (UBI via iris scan) live on Optimism
• Vitalik on biometric proof of personhood
• Farcaster adds ENS usernames
Farcaster adds ENS usernames
• A retrospective on TCR Party
A retrospective on TCR Party
• Gas guzzler: Pond0x memecoin allowed anyone to transfer tokens , based on a Solady mock ERC20
Gas guzzler: Pond0x memecoin allowed anyone to transfer tokens , based on a Solady mock ERC20
Job Listings
• Executive Director sought by Wyoming Stable Token Commission
Executive Director sought by Wyoming Stable Token Commission
• EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team seek ZK circuits engineer
EF Privacy & Scaling Explorations team seek ZK circuits engineer
Job listings: $600 for four issues (75 character limit), payable to abcoathup.eth. Questions?
abcoathup at-gmail
Regulation/business/tokens
• US drops campaign finance charge against SBF claiming that Bahamas didn't agree to that charge
US drops campaign finance charge against SBF claiming that Bahamas didn't agree to that charge
• US SEC: Accounting firms warned about liability from crypto marketing of their non-audit services
Quantstamp settles with SEC for unregistered ICO, fined with proceeds to be returned
US SEC:
• Accounting firms warned about liability from crypto marketing of their non-audit services
Accounting firms warned about liability from crypto marketing of their non-audit services
• Quantstamp settles with SEC for unregistered ICO, fined with proceeds to be returned
• Couple to plead guilty for laundering $4.5B in BTC from Bitfinex 2016 hack
Couple to plead guilty for laundering $4.5B in BTC from Bitfinex 2016 hack
• How newly launched tokens manipulate prices though market makers so they can dump on retail
How newly launched tokens manipulate prices though market makers so they can dump on retail
General
• Lazarus group suspected in payment processor exploits: $60M AlphaPo & $37M CoinsPaid
Lazarus group suspected in payment processor exploits: $60M AlphaPo & $37M CoinsPaid
• Apple fixes zero-day
Apple fixes zero-day
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @abcoathup and
@evan_van_ness to get most of the week’s news in real time.
Permalink for this week’s issue: https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-july-29-2023
